API_ID.description: api_id part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: api_hash part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

SESSION.description: Session string, read the README to learn how to export it with Pyrogram

ADMIN.description: Your user ID, who can control the userbot

CHAT_NAME.description: The channel/group username where to stream radio (without @)
